title: Deaths Up, Masks Off? Nazi Ren Faire 2.10.22
itunes:title: Deaths Up, Masks Off? Nazi Ren Faire 2.10.22
description:
In episode 1082, Jack and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by writer and podcaster Molly Lambert to discuss Global Pandemic Check In - Cases Down, Deaths Up, Masks Off?, Canada’s Neo-Nazi Convoy is Inspring Copycat Protests Around the World and more!

  1. World marks 500,000 covid deaths since omicron, while Fauci says U.S. is exiting ‘full-blown’ pandemic
  2. Covid Live Updates: New York, Illinois, Massachusetts and Rhode Island Will Let Mask Mandates Expire
  3. Canada’s Neo-Nazi Convoy is Inspring Copycat Protests Around the World
  4. GoFundMe ends payments to convoy protest, citing reports of violence and harassment
  5. 'Freedom Convoy' raises millions on new crowdfunding platform
  6. Ottawa woman seeks to sue ‘Freedom convoy’ protesters in $9.8M class action
  7. Presence of children and new demonstrator tactics are complicating police response to trucker occupation, deputy chief says
  8. Right-Wing Americans Want In on Canada’s Anti-Vax ‘Freedom Convoy’


LISTEN: Odd Ras by Chronixx

Follow: @mollylambert @molly_lambert

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
